protocol.text: Seeds were incubated for 12 hours dark either after far-red light or far-red/red light irradiation on aqueous medium.
Far-red light treatment (3.2 μmol m-2 s-1, 5 mins), Red light treatment (13 μmol m-2 s-1, 5mins)
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite software (version 5.0, Affymetrix) and signal intensities were normalized using robust multiple-array average (RMA) method
Total RNA was extracted using the Spectrum plant total RNA kit (Sigma, St. Louis, MO, USA) according to the manufacturer’s protocol.
